briefTitle: DPPE in Combination With Epirubicin and Cyclophosphamide in the Treatment of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase III Study of DPPE Combined With Epirubicin and Cyclophosphamide vs Epirubicin and Cyclophosphamide Alone as First Line Treatment in Metastatic/Recurrent Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histological proof of breast cancer
* Documented evidence of metastatic and/or recurrent breast cancer
* Presence of at least one bi-dimensional or uni-dimensional lesion
* ECOG status 0, 1 or 2
* Quality of life
